website_summaries.verdict: This case will provide all the exterior protection that any hard shell would, with half the weight. It takes the win in the back-saver category.
pros: This is the lightweight Polyfoam model, which is exponentially lighter than other cases
Being a hybrid, it has a rugged nylon exterior, with a thick EPS core and plush lining
A durable zipper keeps this case closed and has ample storage space for all your needs
cons: The interior foam is not as high quality as traditional hardshell cases in this price range
The fit is also a bit sloppy on even standard body shapes

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars. Love it. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This is very light yet very durable and protective. I have a Squier Strat and it fits perfectly. It won’t fit the guitar with the strap on, but I never do that anyways. The pockets are big as well as the inside compartments. Enough room for a few pedels inside or a strap, cord, picks and other small accessories. Very happy 👌🏼🤟🏼🤘🏼 FYI, the guitar strap is a Walker & Williams. It was bought on here. Highly recommend that too.
customer_reviews.author: iBuyStuffOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Do NOT buy!!! (Updated)
customer_reviews.text: This product is much smaller than described, it is intended for small guitars It doesnt fit any of my guitars... so, I sent it back. (Updated bit) The return: The item was received by the seller, I got the notification that said so. Then, after waiting the 7days they said it would take to process. Nothing. Can't call anyone. No service to help. Not sure what to do next. They have the case and my money... Pro level rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Good case, cheap foam under the hood.
customer_reviews.text: This case works pretty well. I had to ship my bass back to the manufacturer and I sent it in this case. The interior molding of the case is made out of cheap Styrofoam. That cheap brittle foam was damaged in shipping. Granted, the case did its job, and the expensive bass was fine, but I have seen much nicer cases that are made out of higher quality materials. Better foam, balsa wood reinforcing, etc. This is a solid 4-star case if you want to protect your bass, but don't expect the best quality or materials.
customer_reviews.author: Retire Early

customer_reviews.title: My favorite guitar case
customer_reviews.text: This fits any Strat shaped electric guitar. That includes my PRS SE 24 Standard and G&L Comanche. Holds the guitar securely. Has enough storage for accessories like strings, winder, capo, slides, picks, etc. The case is ultra lightweight and easy to carry. Though it's a gator case it is not a shipping case. So if you plan to let a gorilla carry your guitar maybe find a different case to protect it. But this case is at the same price point as a gig bag and it is a far superior product compared to a gig bag. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LM39560

customer_reviews.title: Good case - but Gator takes ~4 wks to respond to warranty requests
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for 4 years and it's recently started coming apart. Gator advertises a lifetime warranty, so I attempted to contact them through the Gator website. All I get back are automated emails saying they received my request and will get back to me, but they never actually do. It's a good case, but don't buy it expecting the lifetime warranty. REVISED: Gator took 27 days to get back to me, but they finally did and replaced my case. It was a long time to wait and I almost bought a new case. Anyway, they honored the warranty so I'm bumping my review up to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ocean

customer_reviews.title: Came already broken
customer_reviews.text: One of the "feet" on the bottom of the case was broken off and bouncing around in the box case was shipped in (pre-broken). So, I doubt this case would protect in rough handling situations (it couldn't even make it to me without breaking in the shipping box!)Basic case with too much room inside for my Telecaster so I will have to pack rags around guitar to keep it from sliding around inside the case. I will get proper hard case later. This is NOT a travel case.
customer_reviews.author: Gary T

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy, fits well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my back up guitar (Schecter Reaper-6), and it fits fairly well. The case seems to be made for baritone guitars as well because the head of my guitar barely clears the neck area and leaves a few good inches after that. The body holding area fits well though, and it seems to keep the guitar snug in place. The zippers and padding all feels good quality. I imagine this case will live the lifetime of the guitar it's storing. It's a great less-expensive alternative to a hard case if you don't plan on beating it up too badly.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxon Teeples

customer_reviews.title: Wise purchase, protect your investment.
customer_reviews.text: My guitar teacher had one & recommended. Compared to hard shell: Case is lighter, has no hinges to break & doesn’t scratch up. Plus provides much better protection vs a gig bag. I would have gotten one the shape of a guitar, but this shape provides interior pockets for tuner, cord & amp I hang on belt. Only negative, wouldn’t dare put this with luggage on a plane, but a good plane case is heavier, solid sided, locks & costs 3 to 4 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Light & Sturdy Case
customer_reviews.text: I have both Teles and Strats, and they both rite in this case perfectly. The extra storage areas are great, and you don't get outside storage pockets on a hard case. The case is very well made, durable, and light. I think the price for this product is a very good value. I know this will suit my needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: RKGuy63Top Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really lightweight and sturdy case. It does actually have a decent amount of storage space. My only complaint is that it doesn't have backpack straps like a gig-bag. Without those backpack straps it is quite cumbersome to carry around. If you are doing a lot if gigs and walking more than 500 ft you should definitely consider a gig-bag. All in all this is a great case!
customer_reviews.author: ThatPedalFreak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case; excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the sturdiness of this case. It snugly fit the Yamaha BB615 bass guitar inside, but I knew it would be snug based on measurements! One thing to watch is that the zippers need a bit of dry lubricant to function especially smoothly out of the box. With lubricant, they tend to catch occasionally but that might have evened resolved with use. I just didn't give it the chance!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Might be my favorite case I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I am really digging this case! The foam is very thick and dense, case is light weight. I love the straps on the back. This is definitely the best hybrid between a gig bag and a hard case I've seen. My only complaint is on the SG model there is a little more play than I'd like for the body to move around (I have a Gibson USA SG, maybe an copy or import is slightly larger). More importantly though there is ample support and clearence at the headstock so there no worries about any headstock damage.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Great compact light case for Strats and PRS guitars
customer_reviews.text: I was building custom Fender Strats ... buying the Fender wood cases and then protecting these in storage by buying keyboard gig bags. No more! Now I buy these cases and do not have to worry about the case getting scuffing or tolex getting ripped much less the guitar getting damaged. Great protection for Strats and I have also used these for the new PRS Zach Myers SE. The main body bout may seem tight but it fits great. One less point for the weak zipper tabs that can and have snapped off in the past. These are great compact light cases for Strats and PRS guitars.
customer_reviews.author: Big Spender

customer_reviews.title: Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a case to safely store my bass guitar between uses. Needed to be rigid enough to provide protection, easy to slide under a bed, not heavy. I didn't need it to withstand people throwing the case around. I just needed adequate protection at a reasonable price. I am very satisfied with all this case has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Here's what I hate about this case. First, it doesn't sit well vertically like most hard cases. It wants to fall over. Secondly, like a gig bag, you have to unzip it, in addition to un-Velcroing the 'handle'. The nice thing about a hard case is just flipping a few latches to open it. It offers a little more protection over a gig bag, and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Fits short scale bass
customer_reviews.text: Outta light weight and study. The internal fabric is lovely. Oooooo... Velvet. It fits my 1975 Gibson eb0 short scale bass. Yeah... It fit a short scale. I'm very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Keyser

customer_reviews.title: When I looked at it before putting the bass in I was worried it would be too small but it fits great! Theres also room inside the case for picks
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my Ibanez TMB-100 and it fits PERFECTLY! When I looked at it before putting the bass in I was worried it would be too small but it fits great! Theres also room inside the case for picks, a tuner and some other miscellaneous things. I travel a lot with my bass and wanted an affordable case that would offer more protection than a gig bag. I wanted to get an airplane case but we decided we didn't need quite that much protection yet. This case is perfect. I've had it for a long time and have had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. I got it to store whichever guitar is getting ignored. My Ibanez is a VERY CLOSE fit across the bottom of the body, and something is too tall to let the lid close properly. Takes just a gentle push. Fits my Telecaster perfectly. Great case. I will get another one later.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Fairly durable
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect case for a novice or "part time" gig player. It's sturdy but possibly not sturdy enough for those that make a living playing. But on the other hand, it will hold up for quite some time if care it taken.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Good soft(ish) case
customer_reviews.text: This is a universal fit case, so I use a scarf as batting. This does not support the neck properly, so that is where the scarf goes and then it is properly supported. Once it all zips up, everything is held together well. There are accessory spaces n either side of the neck, I use it to put a bottle of polish and stuff like that. The exterior pocket is spacious, big enough for 2 cables, by monitoring headphones in their case and an extra set of strings. I like this case but frankly I will be buying a hardshell case soon as the zipper is so annoying to do all the time.
customer_reviews.author: KayakFisherman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price/
customer_reviews.text: I still can't believe how amazing this case is. It fits my Ibanez S670QM S Series perfectly *as well as my cables and accessories. Absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: PSantO

customer_reviews.title: Great middle ground between a gig bag and a TSA travel case
customer_reviews.text: My Fender PB fits great, plenty of room for strap, cable etc. This is way better than a gig bag, but I would not check it as baggage on a plane. If that's what you need, search for a TSA case, which will be much more $, much sturdier, and much heavier. But this is really fine for the back of say a mini-van
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Great Case for what you need
customer_reviews.text: I am one of those I really prefer hardshell cases people but I took a chance on this due to trying to save a bit and really I am only going to use this to go from my friends to my house to jam, so I bought one and after having the 1 I came back and bought a 2nd one as well, this is a great case for those impromptu jam nights to even out playing your local shows.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Vass

customer_reviews.title: It seems sturdy enough for everyday
customer_reviews.text: Fits a standard Fender bass well, and will not not let the bass slide around too much. The neck pocket is wide enough for a 5 string with 3/4" string spacing at the bridge. It seems sturdy enough for everyday, non-touring use, and is significantly lighter in weight than an ABS case. The integral storage spaces are large enough for a padded strap, instrument cable, spare strings and basic accessories. A good case for the money. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jack H.

customer_reviews.title: Super light and a snug fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a short scale Squier Jaguar knowing it would be a bit longer than I needed. The interior is designed in such a way that the bass is held securely in place even though there is about 3 or 4 inches of space on the body end. Super lightweight and seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse LeSueur

customer_reviews.title: I love gator cases and this is the best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Supper light, very strong and protective. The covering ensures no dings, scratches or scars on the case ever. Best of all it cost less than most hard-shell cases.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie Curtis

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. Very protective
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Very protective. Perfect fit for my Telecaster. Super light! If you don't wanna shell out for a hard case, this is the next best thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent softcase
customer_reviews.text: Not a hardshell, this softcase is more protective than a typical gigbag but lightweight. The foam will dent slightly under very hard finger pressure, but is an inch thick at the thinnest point so should be adequate. Ignore the picture, the case is rectangular, approximately 40"x15"x5", and fits my strat-style perfectly. It has two interior spaces that can hold a pocket-size effects box, strings, straps, etc. The outside zipped pocket will accept a 9"x12" songbook or a couple of pedals with some room to spare. The mesh outer pocket doesn't hold much but, oddly, does open at both ends. The zippers are plastic coil-type with no markings.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Lonstein

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Nice case, reasonable price, pretty solid for what it is. Good zippers and a strap, basic but more than adequate. Fits a Tele and probably a lot of other guitars too.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: Okay, bad smell.
customer_reviews.text: Decently built - value for the money. But seriously has a chemical smell, more China junk - who knows what they are using for material.
customer_reviews.author: cameracraze

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: This fit my MTD-5 reasonably well (35" scale, 19mm spacing--long and wide,) there is about 1 1/2 inches of extra space length wise. I have another 6-string bass (35" scale, 18mm spacing) that does not fit. Case is light, and will protect reasonably well--I wouldn't use it for flying, but for getting to gigs it's perfect. Would be nice if they added backpack straps.
customer_reviews.author: T. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Good for a basic travel case
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good case for the money. Really light weight but everything seems to fit how it should.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the modest price!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This case fits my Ibanez SFR 5 string long scale Bass like a glove. It is very light yet, tough. Won`t damage anything it bumps against and gives solid protection for the Bass. It has plenty of room for pedals and papers, iPad or whatever. You can`t go wrong for the price. I`m super satisfied, as I have been with everything Gator. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ian A. Mclean

customer_reviews.title: Not thick enough
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the construction of this case. I think this would have been the perfect case for my needs. I failed to take proper measurements of my Bass (Hoffner - Beatle Bass) which is slightly thicker. Hence is does not fit in this type of case. If this company would make a case to accommodate the style of Bass I have, I would buy it in a sec.
customer_reviews.author: Alex H009

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough to protect, light enough to carry
customer_reviews.text: This case has it all-buttloads of storage, lightweight, tough and straps on like a backpack. I bought two. HSC is under the bed forever. Maybe I'd use a HSC if I flew with the guitar but otherwise this is my go to.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny O

customer_reviews.title: Son LOVES It!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our son last Christmas. He adores it as he has to shuffle from home to college.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Gator guitar case
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar case, stays balanced in your hand, plenty of inside and out storage. Protects my instrument well
customer_reviews.author: God's bass servant

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my Ibanez RG550, fits great and works great - great quality.
customer_reviews.author: KerryWhite

customer_reviews.title: VERY light!
customer_reviews.text: Love it- I needed a light case, this one is excellent. not quite the protection of a hard case, but a major step up from a gig bag.
customer_reviews.author: Timbeaux

customer_reviews.title: nice bass case
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want to spend lots of money, but wanted a good product. This case fits my needs. Both of my basses fit into this case - a 35" scale Ibanez BTB and a 34" scale ESP/LTD Surveyor, both 5 strings. Only giving it 4 stars as the zipper tends to hang up in one spot because it wasn't attached to the case body halves accurately. But a nice light weight case, none the less. Looking to get another one for my new Strat!
customer_reviews.author: P. Refsnider

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Case
customer_reviews.text: Great little case at a great price, very lightweight, fits my Fender Stratocaster perfectly. Provides great protection and is super light. Hardware seems to be pretty heavy duty. I would not hesitate to take this out to a gig.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne AutumnTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: This case is exactly what I was looking for. It has a beautiful soft carpeted inner lining and it fits my bass perfectly. It is light-weight, but strong. I feel much more comfortable transporting my bass knowing that this case is protecting it. It has plenty of space for extra item's like cords, tuners, and picks as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tangent

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Case. Would purchase another!
customer_reviews.text: This case is great! If you want hardshell protection without the weight, this case is ideal. I'm not using this case to tour or travel with - home protection only - so I cannot attest to the durability outside normal home use. Plenty of compartments and room for storage as well. Keep it up, Gator!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D.

customer_reviews.title: Beyond My Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This case arrived and was beyond what I expected! The pockets and compartments inside are a lot larger than they look in the picture which is awesome! It's made of good material and looks professional. I have yet to see how a guitar fits in it though because my new guitar will arrive in a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice guitar case. Its a soft case but it is very sturdy and the padding will make this just about equal to any hard case I've ever used. It has enough storage room inside to fit anything you will need for traveling with your guitar like cords, strap, picks, etc. My Telecaster and Strat both fit perfectly in it. If you're looking for an inexpensive case this would be a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: If your guitar is bigger than a small stat, it might not fit properly. I used a Peavey At 200. It was off by about 2 inches. I used a vice to squish the material at the head of the case, so the head of the guitar would slip in. Still off by a little less than 1/2 inch. I'm going to keep the case, assuming my guitar will shrink after the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jack P Kovic

customer_reviews.title: Guitar Armor
customer_reviews.text: This is the case your guitar dreams about. Do him/her/it a favor and buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very strong solid sturdy case
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome and for the price you cant beat it. You'd have to run your guitar over with a car to damage it inside this thing. I love it. Fits my esp guitar perfectly snug and there is plenty of room for your cables and gadgets too. Cant go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: devintdeangelo

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and very durable. Has mAny pockets to store accessories. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: T. Stockman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit strats...
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t fit my Fender player strat... odd for a case that literally says it fits a fender strat. It wouldn’t close because it caught on the 3 standard strat knobs that any strat has. Confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Bought this thing

customer_reviews.title: Really nice case since it is lightweight and not that big ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice case since it is lightweight and not that big or awkward to carry, well lined in fluffy felt with places to put some things inside and the outside has two nice pockets. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KayB-DebVAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Replacement for a Strat Case
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my MIM Strat and it much lighter, carries easier, and has way more storage than the standard tweed case.
customer_reviews.author: gwilson1010

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Strat or Tele
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty case, and good storage. Fits my Strat and Tele's like a glove
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: Buy this case!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Fully supports the neck if my grandsons strat!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great case for a large electric bass
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Ibanez BTB really well (35" neck, large horns). All I did was add a small piece of foam at one end to keep the strap lug from punching a hole in the foam. Very lightweight, great for gigging where you move your own gear. Not for airline travel or throwing gear into the back of a van along with cabs, amp etc.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Gold Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Guitar Case
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect for my needs. Guitar fits great. Sturdy and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Nice but slightly overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Slightly short for our Squier Stratocaster, maybe by 1/4 inch or so, but the quitar still fits if you just press it in firmly. Seems a little overpriced, I would love it more if it were $20 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Schiff

customer_reviews.title: bought this case to ship a found guitar back from ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this case to ship a found guitar back from Afghanistan, figured free guitar did not need a high dollar case. It lived through the USPS trip very well. Looking at maybe buying more for some of my other guitars
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hightower

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit Schecter Omen
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT fit Schecter Omen guitars, even though it says it does in the product description. It's well made but that doesn't matter if your guitar doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my son for his birthday, he is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: aaron michael

customer_reviews.title: great case for Fender telecaster
customer_reviews.text: great case, offers solid protection at a low cost. keep an eye on Amazon warehouse deals (returned items, or items damaged in shipping). Got one at a very low price and came in just like new. this case perfectly fits a Jim Root telecaster, just FYI.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Wrong fir
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my guitar, though description said it would
customer_reviews.author: ARH

customer_reviews.title: Nice case the price just needs to go back down to $89
customer_reviews.text: I love the case I'm just not happy the price went up from $89
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Paris

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with a Gator
customer_reviews.text: Universal case for Strat or Tele. Good case, light and way better protection then a regular gig bag.
customer_reviews.author: j taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, extremely well made. Jackson dinky fits perfectly. Plenty of room for storage. Hard foam padding covered by very soft material
customer_reviews.author: Airik

customer_reviews.title: Good guitar case!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't really fit the new Ibanez guitar I just bought with the jumbo frets as I thought it would because there is an Ibanez in the picture. I ended up using it for my Washburn Mercury which has a strat body and it fit like a glove and I just love the light-weight capability it has.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for money
customer_reviews.text: I chose this one to see how it would be when I received it...and it was everything I expected and and even more..excellent fit...no movement inside at all...great protection for home and car travel....
customer_reviews.author: James L. McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Gets your stuff where it needs to go with less dents.
customer_reviews.text: Digging this bag, so far soo good, just your standard zip and go type deal no fancy clamps and stuff, toted the bass around quite a bit in it, no problems to speak of, gator comes through once again.
customer_reviews.author: Neverdweller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for portability
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lightweight case for your Gibson or Epiphone SG. It will NOT fit an ESP LTD viper model guitar. Great case.
customer_reviews.author: William P Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Gator case because the Fender Stratocaster I just bought was to be hand carried to me in Africa! The case, and especially, guitar, both arrived in pristine shape!! Great, light yet sturdy guitar case, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jlr261

customer_reviews.title: Fits Yamaha Electric Bass
customer_reviews.text: Fits my son's Yamaha TRBX 305 Electric Bass Guitar nicely. Enough said...
customer_reviews.author: Spanky3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect case for the Ibanez Gio I just bought.
customer_reviews.author: Country Jim

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Case for the Price$$$
customer_reviews.text: Overall 4.5 Stars...Fits an Ibanez SoundGear Bass almost perfectly... Even without having to take off a PlantWaves PlanetLock Strap... Plenty of space for Straps, Cords, etc... Fantastic Case for the Price$$$....!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great case, fits several of my guitars and has a convenient pocket for sheets or books.
customer_reviews.text: Love this case, it's sturdy, light and fits several of my guitars (a PRS McCarty, a Strat, and a couple of strat like custom things).
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Guitar Case
customer_reviews.text: It's light weight, it's sturdy, it's perfect for my Stratocaster!
customer_reviews.author: rhyan28

customer_reviews.title: Great case, super light
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. Feels every bit as protective as a hard case but way lighter. I like the outside pocket and zipper closure too.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Bailly

customer_reviews.title: A good case for the money
customer_reviews.text: A good case for the money, it does what my kid needs right now, but I'm still concerned about the soft shell holding up like a hard shell would, but it hold everything nicely inside!
customer_reviews.author: WJBushSr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Strat perfectly. Zips up well and protects my guitar from clumsiness.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Nahm

customer_reviews.title: Schecter Zacky Vengeance 6661
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Schecter Zacky Vengeance 6661 guitar. It's not made specificly for this guitar, but since the liner is foam based, it eventually formed to the shape of guitar. Lovin it!
customer_reviews.author: HQ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice case for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent case for the price. It just fits my old Electra. Looks decent. Not sure how it would hold up to constant carry and use as a gig case. Time may tell.
customer_reviews.author: CLF

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Ibanez Genesis like a glove. It seems pretty solid and is very light.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Fender Strats or Teles
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for Fender Strats or Teles if you don't want to spend a fortune but still get the protection you need.
customer_reviews.author: ZankFrappa

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this case
customer_reviews.text: It fits my tele perfectly. It's strong enough to feel like it's safe, but light enough to never worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this case. Very sturdy and well made. Protects the guitar well and is definitely worth spending the extra money if you are considering a gig bag. Made for strat style guitars. Check the company web site for sizing information.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Sander

customer_reviews.title: Great Guitar Case
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful case. It is soft and lightweight, but rigid inside and will protect my new guitar nicely. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: S. Y. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells a bit. The handle is poorly made. The quality overall fits the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hongchi Liu

customer_reviews.title: Great case, good price
customer_reviews.text: This case is great! It's really light, but well built, so I don't feel like I have to worry about my bass getting damaged on transportation. Solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Daveofva

customer_reviews.title: It's a case!
customer_reviews.text: Holds by electromatic Gretsch bass with room to spare. Solid and sturdy. Interior has room for storage. Won't protect like a hard case, but way better than a gig bag. Buy one if you need one!
customer_reviews.author: A. Pellera

customer_reviews.title: Great medium duty case
customer_reviews.text: Great medium duty case. I fit my Musicman in here with no problem. It's not a custom case, but the design keeps it secure. I've never had it shift on me. Very light, but durable. I had a kid trip and land on it with the bass inside, and no damage to case or bass.
customer_reviews.author: AL B.

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, sturdy, solid enough to protect guitar. Extra storage pockets rock. Soft interior.
customer_reviews.author: Crom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect split between hard case and gig bag
customer_reviews.text: I built a custom SG from a template and it fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic cases for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic cases for the money. Far more manageable than hard cases with very good protection. I actually prefer the Gator version the the SKB which costs $20 more. Both are great but this seems a little better made and less expensive. Fits Teles and Strats perfect
customer_reviews.author: Guy Coniglio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our grandsons bass guitar and he is proud of it,too.
customer_reviews.author: S&v c.

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight case, fits my Fender Telecasters perfectly. I hang them on the wall for easy access then put the guitar du jour in for my church gig. Nice storage space for strap, strings & music too.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Chezidek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: he loved it a lot thank you all for having the things I look for
customer_reviews.author: Sharon l childers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice & lightweight for a 7 year old to carrry but strong enough to protect the guitar
customer_reviews.author: Lady MB

customer_reviews.title: Gator P bass case
customer_reviews.text: great for a P bass which is what it appears to have been designed for. a Fender Mustang bass kinda fit in there too, but the case might need some very minor mods to make it work perfect for the Mustang. i don't think it would work for a Gibson or Guild (headstock). its a great case.
customer_reviews.author: bass ur face

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice case for the money. Fits my daughters Squire Strat snuggly.
customer_reviews.author: Fixer

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Sturdy and Plush
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome and it arrived in perfect condition, well packaged and on time. Fits my left-handed Ibanez GSR200 perfectly. I was worried that the inside material was going to be skimpy, like some I saw at a local music store, but NO, it's plush and cushy. My bass is well protected, easy to carry and not heavy. The outside pocket is a plus that hard cases do not have. I ♥ this case and so will you!
customer_reviews.author: Godsgirl

customer_reviews.title: A great case
customer_reviews.text: This case is FANTASTIC. Really solid, a perfect fit, lightweight compared to other cases. And it's very sturdy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LoWo

product_meta.title: Gator Cases Lightweight Polyfoam Guitar Case fits Stratocaster and Telecaster Style Electric Guitars (GL-ELECTRIC)
product_meta.description: Style:ElectricGator Cases GL-ELECTRIC lightweight series of guitar case gig-bag hybrid features a lightweight but rigid EPS polyfoam interior protective shell with a soft deep plush lining. The GL series of lightweight guitar case gig-bag hybrid are a sturdy solution for around town travel and local gigs. The Gator Cases GL series lightweight hybrid guitar gig-bag cases have a rugged black nylon exterior. The case gig-bag hybrid also features a comfortable nylon carry handle and a sturdy removable shoulder strap. The lightweight guitar case also has 2 accessory compartments for storing tuners, strings, and other accessories. The GL-ELECTRIC dimensions are Body Length 18.5”, Body Height 2.4” Lower Bout Width 12.6” Middle Bout Width 12.6” Upper Bout Width 12.6” and Overall Length 42.1” and fits popular models such as Charvel DX-1FR, San Dimas Style 1 HH, 1 HS, ESP E-II ST-1QM, F-10KIT, JH-330, LTD GL-200K, LTD H-208, LTD JH-600, LTD KH-202, LTD KH-25, LTD KH-602, M-1000, M-200FM, M330, MW-SKULL, Viper 256, Viper 50, fender Telecaster, Stratocaster, Ibanez AR325, AR420, AM73BSRF, GRX20Z, GRX70QA, IJX40, JEM7V Steve Vai, Jackson Adrian Smith SDX, Broderick Pro Series, DKMG Dinky, Jacson Pro Soloist, JS32, MG, SL1, SL2, Musicman Axis, John Petrucci, Silhouette, Steve Morse, PRS S2, SE, Schecter Damien Elite, Hellraiser, Omen, Squire Telecaster, Stratocaster, Washburn Nuni Bettencourt, and many other models of electric guitars including Fender, Squire, ESP, PRS, Jackson, and Schecter. The Gator Cases GL series of guitar case models include acoustic guitar, classical guitar, bass guitar, electric guitar, such as Fender Stratocaster, Fender Telecaster, Fender Precision Bass, as well as models specifically designed to fit Epiphone, Gibson Les Paul, Gibson SG, and Gibson 335 style guitars. Models are also available for Yamaha APX guitars, jumbo acoustic guitars, mandolin, and banjo. Gator Cases is known for manufacturing innovative products designed to protect! We offer a wide range of available sizes, materials, and protection levels, for all types of instruments and gear including Frameworks stands, Rackworks install racks and accessories, and Protechtor drum cases. It isn’t hard to find a great reason why Gator should be the brand you trust to protect your equipment for life!
feature_bullets: Hybrid style case designed to fit standard electric guitars such as Fender Stratocaster/Telecaster
Rugged nylon exterior with dense EPS foam core and plush lining
Interior storage compartment and zippered outer pocket offer secure hideaways for capos, strings, picks, and accessories
Heavy-duty nylon web carry handle and removable shoulder strap makes it comfortable and easy to take your case on the road
Interior dimensions: Body length 18.5" Body Height 2.4" Lower bout Width 12.6" Middle bout Width 12.6" Upper Bout Width 12.6" Overall Length 41.6"
